org.jslipc.util

Class BufferUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jslipc.util.BufferUtil

  • public final class BufferUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for handling buffers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void releaseBuffer(MappedByteBuffer buffer)
      Due to a weakness in the implementation in mapped byte buffers on windows, the underlying file cannot be deleted even if all channels/files are closed.
      static void releaseBufferSilently(MappedByteBuffer buffer)
      Calls releaseBuffer(MappedByteBuffer) and silently catches all exceptions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • releaseBuffer

        public static void releaseBuffer(MappedByteBuffer buffer)
                          throws Exception
        Due to a weakness in the implementation in mapped byte buffers on windows, the underlying file cannot be deleted even if all channels/files are closed. As a workaround, this method tries to call sun.misc.Cleaner.clean() in order to free mapped buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • releaseBufferSilently

        public static void releaseBufferSilently(MappedByteBuffer buffer)
        Calls releaseBuffer(MappedByteBuffer) and silently catches all exceptions.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
